alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 31 at 2:34AM MDT until April 02 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 9 inches, except 2 to 15 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...The Big Hole and Centennial Mountains, the Beaverhead and Lemhi highland, and the Island Park region. This includes the towns of Victor, Island Park, Kilgore, Dubois, Spencer, Small, and the Edie School. * WHEN...From late tonight through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
